Implementation of a Self-organizing Map (SOM) in Processing for "organizing" the colors of photographs. Partially inspired by Ursus Wehrliâ€™s Tidy Art book. Code available here.

Try clicking on one of the pictures to see the flowers get tidied up.

Below is a gallery of some more examples of the SOM at work.

The code is available here as well as on Open Processing. A newer version of my SOM implementation for OpenFrameworks can be found on GitHub; details for that project as well as ofxLearn found here.
